metadata.title: CVE-2022-41401 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: OpenRefine <= v3.5.2 contains a Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF)vulnerability, which permits unauthorized users to exploit the system,potentially leading to unauthorized access to internal resources andsensitive file disclosure.

criterions.comment: openrefine package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
